item.title: Introduction to Natural Language Processing
item.description: A quick intro to the basic terminology and concepts in Natural Language Processing. Token A token is the smallest semantic subsection of a piece of text. For example, a word. This is the smallest subdivision of a text that can be assigned meaning (any smaller units than a word, like individual letters, have no inherent meaning to them) n- gram An n- gram is a collection of n tokens.
